|ElectoralVotes = 10 |State Animal = Horseshoe crab }}  'Maryland' For those
who distinguish them, Maryland is pronounced as in merry , not as in the name
Mary . (Random House Dictionary) is a U.S. state located in the Mid-
Atlantic region of the United States, bordering Virginia, West Virginia, and the
District of Columbia to its south and west; Pennsylvania to its north; and
Delaware to its east. Maryland was the seventh state to ratify the United States
Constitution, and has three occasionally used nicknames: the [[Maryland 400|Old
Line State]], the Free State, and the Chesapeake Bay State.

Maryland is one of the smallest states in terms of area, but it remains one of
the most populous as well as one of the most densely populated states of the
United States. The state's largest city is Baltimore, and its capital is
Annapolis. Although the state is officially claimed to be named after Queen
Henrietta Maria, many historians believe Maryland was named after
Mary, the mother of Jesus by George Calvert, prior to his death in
1632. The original intent may never be known. [http://www.ncregister.com/site/article/catholics-give-thanks-to-
god-in-maryland Catholics Give Thanks to God in Maryland]. NCRegister.
Retrieved on 2013-07-12. Maryland has the highest median household
income, making it the wealthiest state in the nation. {{cite web
|url=http://proximityone.com/stmhi0910.htm |title=State Median Household
Income Patterns: 1990-2010 |publisher=U.S. Census Bureau |accessdate=2012-08-
06 }}
